recipesJson.name: Bold Exchanges
recipesJson.author: FlyingCustard
recipesJson.description:
Threw this together 4 times in the last 4 weeks as a shake and vape strawberry cream feely mix and it's actually pretty good! Optional sweetener to Your taste but I don't use it. 

Yes I know that's a lot of strawberry and the balance might seem off but for a quick fix it works well.
